name: The Staff of Chaos X
description:
Game made for Brackeys Game Jam  2021.2 (I missed the jam for a minute, but the game stays here if you want to play anyway)

(Due to the short time, the game has not been polished and has some bugs, but is still playable.)

The Chaos Staff changes its power randomly, use its faster magic or press the button for stronger power.

CONTROLS (Select in "Options" screen):

TYPE A:

  • MOVE/CROUCH: Arrow Keys
  • ATTACK: X
  • JUMP: Z
  • PAUSE: Enter

TYPE B:

  • MOVE/CROUCH: W, A, S, D
  • ATTACK: Shift
  • JUMP: Ctrl
  • PAUSE: Enter

Game by Róger Goulart

Music by Malu Colusso
